articles.title: Kremlin Unleashed? Trump’s Deadline Invites Escalation in Ukraine, Ex-CIA Analyst Warns
articles.description: Former State Department adviser and CIA analyst Paul Goble says Trump’s 50-day deadline gives Russia the green light for summer offensive.
articles.content: WASHINGTON DC - Paul Goble, a former State Department special adviser and ex-CIA analyst, warns that US President Donald Trump’s recent 50-day ultimatum to Russia regarding a peace deal with Ukraine, coupled with the threat of sanctions, may backfire... [3430 chars]
